column4: hay friends. i am new to linux environment, need your help and support
any one can give me an advise ??
i want to migrate from windows environment
and i am very confused ....... there is alot of distro in linux...
and i really dont know anything abut the new O.S
It's GNU/Linux distributions not Linux distributions
I can aswer many of your questions.
Did you see that I just sended you a PM?
Define `best'? Freedom? That it is technical superior?
What do you want to do?
Which softwares are you using in Windows?
You mean that you want to set rules for the firewall.
If Ubuntu using iptables I might can help you.
